This is GnuTLS from http://www.gnutls.org/download.html .


GMP_CFLAGS="-I/home/baccy/workspace/se.haxx.curl-curl/build/linux64/external/gmp/install/include" GMP_LIBS="/home/baccy/workspace/se.haxx.curl-curl/build/linux64/external/gmp/install/lib/libgmp.a" PKG_CONFIG_PATH="/home/baccy/workspace/se.haxx.curl-curl/build/linux64/external/libnettle/install/lib/pkgconfig" ./configure --enable-static=yes --enable-shared=no --with-pic --with-included-libtasn1 --with-included-unistring --without-p11-kit
